idea: We are supplying Towels & Sheets to Exporters for Health Care + Hospitals + Retail. We buy the raw material & then coordinate production at various units. Thereafter we supply the finished products for exports.

idea: Toll Management & Highway Traffic Management System Integration with Control & Command Center. SITC of all field & CC equipment and integrate with inhouse software. Energy Efficient LED light project with networking and connected to control & command center with inhouse software through GPRS.
name: DEENR INFRATECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Eclatmax Training And Consulting is focused on providing corporate training, executive coaching and business consulting solutions to organizations within India as well as globally. We specialize in offering value-added Human Capital Development solutions to a corporate clientele. Through our network of independent trainers, coaches and consultants, Eclatmax’s business model encompasses an aggregator-based and leveraged approach. It is a B2B (Business To Business) concentred model. The emphasis is on maintaining fixed costs at a bare minimum and creating a profitable as well as scalable global enterprise. Although presently Eclatmax’s solutions include training, coaching and consulting services offered through the classroom-based and live online formats, our future strategy is to embark on a paradigm shift by blending technology within it. Data analytics in training, coaching and consulting would be an added value proposition which the company intends to enable for our corporate clients.
name: ECLATMAX TRAINING AND CONSULTING PRIVATELIMITED

idea: Our goal is to provide security, IoT Solutions & make a difference to the lives of our customers by providing variety combined with cutting-edge technology, innovation & affordability. We believe Livedarshan has already created a niche that is unassailable. Our mission is to grow into India’s most trusted and favored security , IoT and surveillance solution provider besides bring global technologies with services to our country. Our focus is to go beyond mere surveillance and create an intelligent platform which will re-imagine redefine & centralize Security, IoT & Surveillance in the future. Our vision is to spread that safe , secure and being in-control feeling to all our customers worldwide.
name: LIVEDARSHAN INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Goodma Healthcare Services Pvt Ltd is incorporated in year 2018 with a vision of making healthcare services accessible, affordable and comfortable. We incorporated to maintain, establish, medicate Home Healthcare centres, nursing care center, geriatric care center everywhere.
name: Goodma Healthcare Services Pvt Ltd

idea: HAPPY HOURS is a 'Fun Mobile App' for all promotional offers related to food, drinks, shopping, fashion & entertainment around your city & all across India. The App has vendor (registration) as well as a customer interface to view all available promotional offers / HAPPY HOURS around their GPS location in their mobile or based on their searches. FREE Download on the Google Play Store & Apple App Store.

idea: In 2019, Skyislimit Technologies was established to support, promote and penetrate Salesfokuz into the market.  Incepted in 2015, Salesfokuz is the brainchild of Mr. Manodh Mohan. It took 36 months to implement and penetrate Salesfokuz into the market. Skyislimit has got a team of 70+ passionate and driven individuals in the team. Furthermore, it has has also developed HrmNxt, Storeware, Alpha Billing, and PROMA that are meant for HR management, storeware management, billing software, and project management respectively. The recent addition to the list is a video conferencing app – Fokuz that enables secure and flexible collaborations. Within a short span, the team has won 8 awards and has been recognized by highly respected organizations for the customer-centric services. The team proudly serves 10K users round the globe.
name: SKYISLIMIT TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
